WorkItem.Description:
When modifying the 06largescale example by replacing 'Lastname' with 'Hello\nWorld', the xslx file is not valid and cannot be open.

Thank you for your help.

Stephane
WorkItem.Summary: Example 06largescale.php (Excel2007) with a newline (\n) in a cell

Comments.Message: There is no issue with putting a line break in any cell; your problem likely lies with other changes that you have made, or because you don't have enough memory allocated for PHP to work with a large spreadsheet.
